text:
Sandy Lam, (), is a Hong Kong singer, actress and record producer. She sings in Cantonese, Mandarin, English, and Japanese.
"Singer 2017".
Sandy joined Hunan Television's show "Singer 2017" in January 2017 and she won 1st place in the final (episode 13).
